Text: HEY! Thank you AVG, you just saved my arse stopping a horrible damn virus that would have gone onto my computer after I tried to install this completely. Quite surprised considering the guy who uploaded it was supposed to be trustworthy what with his green skull and all!
Well the program works, but whatever you do don't touch the file in the folder called "ypogeios", don't know what the file was called as AVG has deleted it but it was some sort of patch....
